title: Consider Your Audience
text: Think about who your audience is. Are they familiar with the data? Do they need more explanation?

title: Balancing Clarity and Simplicity
text: Striking a balance between too much and too little is key. Make sure the labels contribute to understanding the data without causing clutter.

title: Understand the Data
text: What are the most critical parts of the data that need to be highlighted for comprehension? Focus on labeling those.
